name: Bangman
description:
Bangman is a top-down action roguelike in which you have to defeat hordes of bloodthirsty and cute monsters as you travel from world to world.

Embark on an exciting journey to save worlds with our heroes. Many types of weapons and spells will help you with this.



Take on the role of one of the summoned heroes and save the worlds from all waves, shooting off crowds of enemies. Each creature contains a useful item that will give you a better chance of survival. At the same time, the enemies are very tenacious and strong, so you think ten times before letting them come to you.

New heroes

Unlock new characters with the help of accumulated gems and get unique abilities and weapons.



Spells

Each spell gives you a short-term enhancement of a particular skill / characteristic, increasing your chances of winning!

Special Skills

The summoned heroes have their own unique abilities that deal decent damage to enemies. The main thing is to use them wisely, because recovery takes a lot of time, and it can cost you your life!
